info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 12:22AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Flathead County through 1245 AM MDT... At 1222 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southwest of East Glacier Park Village, or 36 miles east of Evergreen, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marias Pass and Blacktail. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 181 and 196. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
